ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.5 ounce) package non-instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix

cookingTips: Follow cake mix instructions but reduce liquid slightly to account for pudding mixture
Spread pudding mixture evenly over warm cake so it absorbs properly
Sprinkle chocolate chips on top before pudding sets for melted, fudgy topping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a 'dump cake' that combines cake and pudding. Why is layering pudding on hot cake important?
